item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Starmer claims people with shares do not count as ‘working people’
2. [Opinion] How squeezing the rich through tax may backfire
3. Morgan Stanley grants post-employment perks to former CEO James Gorman
4. Reeves confirms change to UK fiscal rules to help fund £20bn of annual investment
5. Tech boom forces US funds to dump shares to avoid breach of tax rules
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
